conclusion: Violation of Art. 6-1;Remainder inadmissible;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed
docname: CASE OF KARAPANAGIOTOU AND OTHERS v. GREECE
scl: Azinas v. Cyprus [GC], no. 56679/00, ECHR 2004-III;Fressoz and Roire v. France [GC], no. 29183/95, ECHR 1999-I;G.B. v. France, no. 44069/98, ECHR 2001-X;Mantovanelli v. France, 18 March 1997, Reports of Judgments and Decisions 1997-II;Platakou v. Greece, no. 38460/97, ECHR 2001-I;Zouboulidis v. Greece (no. 2), no. 36963/06, 25 June 2009
